DOC.brief_title: Use CBCT-based Tooth Replica Tooth Autotransplantation Improve Outcome Tooth Replacement Children
DOC.criteria: The subject divide two group accord different surgical protocol . 1 . Pediatric subject ( age 918 year ) treat CBCTbased replica procedure ( prospective approach ) . Pediatric subject ( N=50 ) miss teeth due agenesis lose permanent teeth due trauma , caries , endodontic failure refer dentistry department replacement miss tooth mean tooth autotransplantation . 2 . Pediatric subject ( age 918 year ) treat conventional method ( prospective retrospective ) . Pediatric subject ( N=50 ) miss teeth due agenesis lose permanent teeth due trauma , caries , endodontic failure refer dentistry department replacement miss tooth mean tooth autotransplantation . A matched control patient select focus similar surgical challenge , base age , gender match donor tooth stage root development host bed .
